Title: Gardner Denver Holdings
Manager: Goldman, Sachs/ Citigroup/ UBS Investment Bank/ KKR/ Simmons & Company International (Energy Specialists of Piper Jaffray)/ Deutsche Bank Securities/ Baird/ Credit Suisse/ Morgan Stanley
CO_managers: William Blair/ Stifel/ HSBC/ Macquarie Capital/ Credit Agricole CIB/ Mizuho Securities
Business: We are a leading global provider of mission-critical flow control and compression equipment and associated aftermarket parts, consumables and services, which we sell across multiple attractive end-markets within the industrial, energy and medical industries. We manufacture one of the broadest and most complete ranges of compressor, pump, vacuum and blower products in our markets, which, combined with our global geographic footprint and application expertise, allows us to provide differentiated product and service offerings to our customers.
